generic:link.msg:message: Total Exposure (E)"=" Fund Based Credit Exposure (A)" + "Non-Fund Based Exposure (B)" + "Investment Exposure (C)" - "Exempted Exposure (D)
Value not satisfied : Value reported should be positive
Value not satisfied : Value reported should be positive
If value of "Nature of interest" , "Type of bank's exposures" and "Asset Classification" is "Not Applicable" then reporting of other mentioned columns should be " Not Applicable".
If value of "Nature of interest" is "Not Applicable" then reporting of numerical values should be "Zero".
If value of "Type of bank's exposures" and "Asset Classification" is "Not Applicable" then reporting of other mentioned columns should be "Not Applicable".
If value of "Type of bank's exposures" and "Asset Classification" is "Not Applicable" then reporting of numerical values should be "Zero".
If value of "Nature of interest", "Type of bank's exposures" and "Asset Classification" is "Not Applicable" then reporting of other mentioned columsn should be "Not Applicable".
If value of "Nature of interest" or "Type of bank's exposures" or "Asset Classification" is "Not Applicable" then rreporting of numerical values should be " Zero".
